item.title: What is Drop Leaf Games
item.description: What Is Drop Leaf Games Drop Leaf Games is a collection of my tabletop game designs, the inspiration and methods I use to create them. Like a drop leaf table that folds out into a larger playing surface, Dropleaf games aspire to have a larger play space than their visible components indicate. My Designs My design aesthetic tends towards tightly coupled systems. My starting point is usually an attempt to use a mechanism in a novel way.
